data.name: NetworkSettingsNote
data.value: * Network settings will take effect after restart

data.name: UpstreamProxyToolTip
data.value: Specify address of the upstream proxy. The default value is 127.0.0.1.

data.name: Connection_DownstreamProxyToolTip
data.value: Specify the downstream proxy settings. This setting will override the upstream proxy settings. For advanced users only.

data.name: Connection_UpstreamProxyPortToolTip
data.value: Specify port number of the local proxy server.

data.name: Connection_UseUpstreamProxyToolTip
data.value: Use local proxy server. Enable if you want to route the connection through third-party application (e.g: MyFleetGirls).

data.name: ThemeToolTip
data.value: Use the specified color theme. Changes will take effect after restart. Custom option will use color values from Settings\ColorScheme.json

data.name: UI_RenderingTestToolTip
data.value: This is a preview. Use the slider below to adjust the value.

data.name: UI_IsLayoutFixedToolTip
data.value: Apply the same height for all UI fonts. If disabled, the font height may differ for each UI elements.

data.name: UI_BarColorMorphingToolTip
data.value: Use color gradient on color bar such as HP, etc.

data.name: Log_SaveLogImmediatelyToolTip
data.value: Write log to file immediately instead of caching it until program exit. If disabled, logs are saved only when exiting the program.

data.name: Log_SaveBattleLogToolTip
data.value: Save battle history as text file. Battle histories are saved in the BattleLog subfolder.

data.name: Log_ShowSpoilerToolTip
data.value: Show developed items and dropped ships in the log. Disable this setting to hide the information.

data.name: Log_LogLevelToolTip
data.value: Specify logging level for the program. Smaller number means more verbose logging. 1: Debug 2: Normal 3: Error-only

data.name: Control_ApplicationIDToolTip
data.value: Application ID to use with Discord Rich Presence

data.name: Control_translationURLToolTip
data.value: Specify the repository to use to update translations.

data.name: Control_DiscordRPCShowFCM
data.value: Show number of First Class Medals

data.name: Control_DiscordRPCShowFCMToolTip
data.value: Check to show on Discord Rich Presence the number of first class medal you have.

data.name: Control_DiscordRPCMessageToolTip
data.value: Allows you to choose what message to display on discord. Use {{secretary}} to put your secretary's name in the message.

data.name: Control_ShowExpeditionAlertDialog
data.value: Warn when sending expedition w/ unmet requirements

data.name: Control_ShowExpeditionAlertDialogTooltip
data.value: Specifies whether to display a warning dialog when a fleet that does not meet the formation conditions departs for an expedition.

data.name: Control_ShowSallyAreaAlertDialogTooltip
data.value: Show a warning dialog when sending fleet with untagged ship to event map. Due to incomplete information, a false positive may also trigger this warning.

data.name: Control_PowerEngagementFormToolTip
data.value: Sets the default engagement form for attack power calculation

data.name: Control_UseSystemVolumeToolTip
data.value: Disable individual volume setting in notification sound and BGM. You will need to use windows volume mixer to adjust the volume setting.

data.name: Debug_LoadAPIListOnLoadToolTip
data.value: Load the following API list at startup. Refer to the online help on format and usage of API list.

data.name: Debug_EnableDebugMenuToolTip
data.value: Show debug menu in the menu bar. Use it at your own risk.

data.name: Life_CanCloseFloatWindowInLockToolTip
data.value: Allow floating window to be closed regardless of lock layout setting.

data.name: Life_LockLayoutToolTip
data.value: Prevent changes to tab layout and window size.

data.name: FormFleet_AppliesSallyAreaColorToolTip
data.value: Use fleet tag color as background of each ship name. The colors may not match each event tag colors.

data.name: FormFleet_EmphasizesSubFleetInPortToolTip
data.value: Highlight expedition fleet idling on homeport.

data.name: FormFleet_BlinkAtDamagedToolTip
data.value: Highlight fleet on homeport if it contains critically damaged ships.

data.name: FormFleet_ReflectAnchorageRepairHealingToolTip
data.value: Show recovered HP in the HP bar from anchorage repair.

data.name: FormFleet_ShowAirSuperiorityRangeToolTip
data.value: Show fleet AS value range based on minimum and maximum plane proficiency. The default setting is to use the lowest plane proficiency for AS calculation.

data.name: FormFleet_ShowAircraftLevelByNumberToolTip
data.value: Show plane proficiency level in digits (1,2,3) instead of symbols (|,||,>>).

data.name: FormFleet_FixedShipNameWidthToolTip
data.value: Specify width of ship name column.

data.name: FormFleet_ShowConditionIconToolTip
data.value: Show fatigue level icon in the fleet window. If disabled, ship fatigue level is denoted by background color.

data.name: FormFleet_EquipmentLevelVisibilityToolTip
data.value: Specify the display mode of improvement and proficiency level of aircraft. If set to prioritize, it will prioritize the specified item over another. If set to both, both item will be displayed.

data.name: FormFleet_ShowAnchorageRepairingTimerToolTip
data.value: Show repair timer in the fleet list window.

data.name: FormFleet_ShowNextExpToolTip
data.value: Show the amount of experience needed to level up. Disable this setting to save horizontal space.

data.name: FormFleet_FixShipNameWidthToolTip
data.value: Specify a fixed width of ship name column. It may decrease horizontal space requirement but may cut off long ship names.

data.name: FormFleet_IsScrollableToolTip
data.value: Show scrollbar if the content does not fit.

data.name: FormArsenal_MaxShipNameWidthToolTip
data.value: Specify maximum width of ship name column.

data.name: FormBattle_Display7thAsSingleLine
data.value: Show 7th ship in the same line

data.name: FormBattle_Display7thAsSingleLineToolTip
data.value: Specify placement of the 7th ship in Striking Force fleet mode. If enabled, it will be displayed under the 6th ship. If disabled, it will be displayed as flagship of the escort fleet. Disabling the setting may save vertical space.

data.name: FormBattle_ShowShipTypeInHPBar
data.value: Show ship type on HP bar

data.name: FormBattle_ShowShipTypeInHPBarToolTip
data.value: Show ship type (e.g: DD) instead of HP title text.

data.name: FormBattle_ShowHPBarToolTip
data.value: Disabling this option will remove the HP bar and save vertical space.

data.name: FormBattle_HideDuringBattle
data.value: Hide until the end of battle

data.name: FormBattle_HideDuringBattleToolTip
data.value: Avoid spoiler by hiding the battle prediction screen. You can temporarily display it by the right-clicking menu of the battle window.

data.name: FormBrowser_SavesBrowserLogTooltip
data.value: Save browser error log to BrowserLog.log. May reduce performance.

data.name: FormBrowser_ForceColorProfileToolTip
data.value: Enable this setting if the browser displays wrong color. * Changes will take effect after application restart.

data.name: FormBrowser_PreserveDrawingBufferToolTip
data.value: Disabling the setting may improve performance. Note: if preserve drawing buffer is not enabled, screenshot size may be limited to browser window size. * Changes will take effect after application restart.

data.name: RestartNotice
data.value: * Some settings will take effect after restart

data.name: FormBrowser_HardwareAccelerationEnabledToolTip
data.value: Use hardware acceleration when available. Note: Disable this setting if you need to use window capture for recording/streaming. * Changes will take effect after application restart.

data.name: FormBrowser_IsDMMreloadDialogDestroyableToolTip
data.value: Hide DMM page reload pop-up dialog from appearing in browser window.

data.name: FormBrowser_ConfirmAtRefreshToolTip
data.value: Displays a confirmation dialog before refreshing the page.

data.name: FormBrowser_ScreenShotFormat_AvoidTwitterDeteriorationToolTip
data.value: Apply modification to images in order to prevent Twitter from automatically converting them to JPEG.

data.name: FormBaseAirCorps_ShowEventMapOnlyToolTip
data.value: Hide AB stationed in non-event map during event period.

data.name: FormJson_AutoUpdateToolTip
data.value: Automatically update the displayed API data. May increase processing load.

data.name: AutoUpdateCouldIncreaseLoad
data.value: ※Enabling automatic update may increase processing load

data.name: FormJson_UpdatesTreeToolTip
data.value: Automatically update tree content when sending/receiving API data. It only works if automatic refresh is enabled. May increase processing load.

data.name: FormJson_AutoUpdateFilterToolTip
data.value: Filter that selects API data to be read at automatic update. Supports Regex.

data.name: Notification_SilencioToolTip
data.value: Hide/stop all notifications and notification sounds.

data.name: BGMPlayer_SyncBrowserMuteToolTip
data.value: Syncronize mute setting with browser window.

data.name: checkBoxUseSecretaryIconForRPC
data.value: Use secretary icon as game picture

data.name: SaveDataPathDoesNotExist
data.value: The specified folder does not exists.

data.name: ProxyAutoConfigSaved
data.value: The proxy auto-config script has been saved. The file path was copied to clipboard, paste it to the proxy settings in Internet Explorer.

data.name: FailedToSavePac
data.value: Failed to save proxy auto-config script.

data.name: PlayerVolumeWillBeSet
data.value: BGM player volume will be set to {0}. Are you sure?
